skills.name: SHOOT
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• Remove Invincibility and Physical, Magic, and True Damage Invulnerability effects before dealing damage.
• Deal Additional True Damage for each beneficial effect on the target.

skills.name: CALL OF COMBAT
desc: • Increase ATK of allies for 2 turns.
• Grant Critical Strike Chance to allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: DISCIPLINE
desc: Gain Shroud and Perfect Hit status for the duration of the battle.
